name: Sai Mengte'er Coal Mine
company_mentions: 内蒙古赛蒙特尔煤业有限责任公司

The Sai Mengte'er Coal Mine is an underground coal mine with a production capacity of 3 million tons per year

operators: 内蒙古赛蒙特尔煤业有限责任公司
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Sai Mengte'er Coal Industry Company, which is fully owned by Ordos City Saimonter Investment Company and Ordos City Tianan Investment Company.
